resources.string: You can always change it later.

Enter the company SSO access code.
Invite people to join the team
The maximum number of invitations has been sent
Something went wrong, please try again
PLEASE ENTER A VALID EMAIL ADDRESS
THIS EMAIL ADDRESS IS ALREADY IN USE
Services are helpers that can improve your workflow. To enable them, ask your administrator.
Services are helpers that can improve your workflow.
Open this conversation to services and people outside your team.
When this is on, people can see when their messages in this conversation are read.
If both sides turn on read receipts, you can see when messages are read.
You can change this option in your account settings.
Open this conversation to services and people outside your team.
Timed messages will be turned on for all the participants in this conversation
You can be notified about everything (including audio and video calls) or only when you are mentioned.
Could not allow guests nor services. Please try again.
Current guests and services will be removed from the conversation. New guests and services will not be allowed.
Anyone with the link can join the conversation, even if they don\'t have Secret
New guests will not be able to join with this link. Current guests will still have access.
People outside your team can join this conversation.

Create a backup to preserve your conversation history. You can use this to restore history if you lose your device or switch to a new one. \nThe backup file is not protected by Secret end-to-end encryption, so store it in a safe place.
The default is stored in the %1$s directory of the sdcard.
The backup will be compressed, and if you set a password, also encrypted. Make sure to store it in a secure place.
You need an email address and a password to use Secret on multiple devices.
Enter the password for your Secret account.\n%1$s
You\'ve used Secret on this device before.
If that was long ago, some messages may not appear here.
The backup contents will replace the conversation history on this device. You can only restore history from a backup of the same platform.
You need an email and a password in order to back up your conversation history. You can do it from the account page in Settings.
The file could not be saved
You may not have enough space or permission to save it there.
Your history could not be restored.
This backup was created by a newer or outdated version of Secret and cannot be restored here.
You cannot restore history from a different account.
Up to 300 people can join a group conversation. Video calls work with up to 3 other people and you.
Up to 300 people can join a conversation.
Up to 300 people can join a conversation. Currently there is only room for %1$s more.
Please contact your team administrator for details (Error %1$s).
Please verify your company SSO access code and try again.
Services have access to the content of this conversation
You can change this option in your account settings.
To take and send photos, grant permission to access the camera
BY CONTINUING YOU AGREE TO _TERMS OF USE_.

HI %1$s, 

 Secret IS SO MUCH NICER
 WITH A PICTURE.
We sent an email to \n[[%1$s]]. \nFollow the link to verify your address.
The email address you provided has already been registered. Please try a different email address.
The email address you entered is not valid. Please verify and try again.
YOUR NUMBER IS OPTIONAL, BUT IT MAKES IT EASIER FOR US TO FIND PEOPLE YOU KNOW. TO MAKE SURE IT\'S YOU, WE\'LL SEND A CONFIRMATION CODE VIA SMS.
ENTER THE 3-DIGIT CONFIRMATION CODE FROM THE SMS.
It helps you log in if you are locked out or lose your phone.
Add your email address and a password.
This lets you use Secret on multiple devices.

Please verify your details and try again.

We already sent you a code via SMS. Tap Resend after 10 minutes to get a new one.
Please verify your details and try again.
Please enter a valid phone number.
Please try to log in later.

Please check your Internet connection and try again.

Secret helps you find your friends if you share your contacts.
I\'m on Secret, search for %1$s or visit get.Secret.com
Hi,\nThanks for the invitation. Let\'s connect.\n%1$s

VIDEO STOPPED DUE TO POOR CONNECTION

plurals.item: Do you still want to send your message?
Do you still want to send your messages?

resources.string: Do you want to accept the call?
Do you still want to place the call?
You must be online to add people. We will try again when you are back online.
You must be online to create a conversation. The other people will see your changes when you are back online.
You won\'t be able to send or receive messages in this conversation.
%1$s won\'t be able to send or receive messages in this conversation.
%1$s won\'t be able to contact you or add you to group conversations.
This will clear the conversation history and remove it from the list.
Add people or share a link to this conversation.
People can find you with these details.
The information is not visible to anyone else
We will send an email to:\n[[%1$s]]\nFollow the link to permanently delete your account.
We will send a SMS to:\n[[%1$s]]\nFollow the link to permanently delete your account.
Are you sure you want to log out?
Name must have 2 or more characters
This helps you connect with others. We anonymize all the information and do not share it with anyone else.
This makes audio calls use less data and work better on slower networks. Turn off to use Constant Bitrate Encoding.
Constant bit rate calls have been temporarily disabled with the introduction of multiple account support. CBR calls will be back soon.
Disable to send via the keyboard.
If you do not recognize the above device, please remove and reset the password immediately
Secret gives every device a unique fingerprint. Compare them and verify your devices and conversations.
If fingerprints don\'t match, reset the session to generate new encryption keys on both sides.
Remove this device if you have stopped using it. You will be logged out of this device immediately.
This helps Secret Support diagnose problems.
Make Secret better by sending anonymous information.
If you experience problems with push notifications, Secret Support may ask you to reset this token.
Please describe the steps required to reproduce the issue, provide screenshots if possible and send this email.\n\n
Enter the verification code we sent to %s
Check your email inbox and follow the instructions.
We will send a notification code to:\n%s

With this username, people will be able to find you on Secret without knowing your email address or phone number.
At least 2 characters. a–z, 0–9, and _ only
You must be online to join. Check your connection and try again.
You must be online to log in. Check your connection and try again.
Take a new photo or select one from your existing photo library.
Secret is so much nicer with a picture.
You must be online to rename a conversation. Check your connection and try again.
You must be online to resend a message. Check your connection and try again.
You must be online to leave the conversation. Check your connection and try again.
You must be online to remove people from conversations. Check your connection and try again.
You must be online to call. Check your connection and try again.
You must be online to change your picture. Check your connection and try again.
